T02D2195:77b-0: @77b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg mdor bsdus pa /
T02D2195:77b-1: bkra shis pa'i gnas su me thabs zlum po dkar po byas la /
T02D2195:77b-2: tsandan nam 'o ma can gyi shing dkar po la zlum por brtsigs te /
T02D2195:77b-3: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02D2195:77b-4: dang la bdun rnam dag bya /
T02D2195:77b-5: de nas me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod cing /
T02D2195:77b-6: 'bras chan dang mar gyi sbyin sreg bya /
T02D2195:77b-7: brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas gang la dmigs pa de zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2195:77b-9: dpal 'phel ba'i gnas su me thab gru bzhi ser po byas la /
T02D2195:77b-10: shing ser po gru bzhi brtsigs te /
T02D2195:77b-11: me tog ser bos dus gsum du mchod cing /
T02D2195:77b-12: rin po che lnga dang 'bru sna lnga'i sbyin sreg byas na /
T02D2195:77b-13: gang la dmigs pa de rgyas pa ra 'gyur ro //
T02D2195:77b-15: rgyas pa lta bu'i gnas su ni //
T02D2195:77b-16: me thab zla gam dmar po brtsigs //
T02D2195:77b-17: seng ldeng dmar po'i zla gam brtsigs la /
T02D2195:77b-18: me tog dmar pos dus gsum du mchod cing /
T02D2195:77b-19: me tog dang sman gyi sbyin sreg byas na /
T02D2195:77b-20: gang la dmigs pa de nyid dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D2195:77b-22: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su me thab gru gsum mthing nag brtsigs /
T02D2195:77b-23: shing nag po tsher ma can gru gsum brtsigs la /
T02D2195:77b-24: me tog sngon pos dus gsum du mchod cing /
T02D2195:77b-25: dug sna sha chen tshil chen yungs kar ske tshe /
T02D2195:77b-26: bgegs kyi ling+ga la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na /
T02D2195:77b-27: gzas pa po tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2195:78a-4: de nas bdun rnam dag bya /
T02D2195:78a-5: de nas me lha'i sbyin sreg bya /
T02D2195:78a-6: de nas thab khung mi dmigs par bya /
T02D2195:78a-7: de nas me lha rang gnas su gsol /
T02D2195:78a-8: slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2195:78a-10: // / h'um bde gshegs gtso bo gtum po dang //
T02D2195:78a-11: lha rnams phyogs su 'khor ba rnams //
T02D2195:78a-12: bdag dang sems can rgyud sbyang phyir //
T02D2195:78a-13: skad cig tsam gyis gshegs su gsol //
T02D2195:78a-14: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'an /
T02D2195:78a-15: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ho /
T02D2195:78a-16: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya dza:badzra a'am ku sha dza:zhes pas spyan drangs la /
T02D2195:78a-17: yi ge brgya pas spyi khrus dbul /
T02D2195:78a-19: sa ma yo ham zhes pas zhal bsil dbul /
T02D2195:78a-20: aom pra p'a ra satk'a ra a'a d'i tsid sv'a h'a /
T02D2195:78a-22: aom ka ma l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2195:78a-23: zhes pas me tog phul la gdan dbul /
T02D2195:78a-24: gang gis 'khor ba'i nyes pa ni //
T02D2195:78a-25: dran pa tsam gyis 'joms mdzad cing //
T02D2195:78a-26: bla med byang chub thob mdzad pa //
T02D2195:78a-27: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2195:78a-28: lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na //
T02D2195:78a-29: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po ni //
T02D2195:78a-30: yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs //
T02D2195:78a-31: skyon med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2195:78a-32: chos nyid stong pa'i dang las ma g-yos kyang //
T02D2195:78a-33: thams la mkhas phyir sna tshogs skur ston pa //
T02D2195:78a-34: rgyal sras khyung gi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2195:78a-35: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02D2195:78a-36: yid kyi ci nus dmigs pa'i mchod 'bul na //
T02D2195:78a-37: kun du bzang po'i mchod sprin chen po ltar //
T02D2195:78a-38: sku gsungs thugs la mnyes pa'i mchog gyur cig / bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas //
T02D2195:78a-39: sdig pa ma lus bgyis pa rnams //
T02D2195:78a-40: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2195:78a-41: spyan sngar so sor sdig bshags so //
T02D2195:78a-42: shes rab snying rjer ldan pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D2195:78a-43: dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin //
T02D2195:78a-44: de yi rjes su bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2195:78a-45: byang chub sems de nam yang mi gtong ngo //
T02D2195:78a-46: bla ma rdo rje 'chang dang ni //
T02D2195:78a-47: gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2195:78b-0: dge @78b ba mdzad la rjes yi rang //
T02D2195:78b-1: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po dang /'khor dang bcas la lus 'bul na //
T02D2195:78b-2: bzhes nas bdag la rjes mthun par //
T02D2195:78b-3: dngos grub rnams ni stsal du gsol //
T02D2195:78b-4: dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
T02D2195:78b-5: da lta dge ba gang spyad pa //
T02D2195:78b-6: bdag dang sems can don slad du //
T02D2195:78b-7: byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D2195:78b-8: phyag rdor bdun rnam dag go //
T02D2195:78b-11: mu tig / rin po che mdung len /
T02D2195:78b-12: gur gum gyis bris pa'i rten 'brel gyi snying po /
T02D2195:78b-14: bya khyung gi snying po khro gser gyis bris pa /
